channel.title: \Project Snow/ The Blizzard Awakes
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/7007/z4bff35012daf3.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/2715/z4bff35ec9f8fc.gif[/img][/CENTER]
Support us by putting this in your sig!!! [url=http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/7007/z4bff35012daf3.gif]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/7007/z4bff35012daf3.gif[/url]
[CENTER]PROGRESS [COLOR="Lime"]|||[/COLOR][COLOR="Orange"]|||[/COLOR][COLOR="Red"]|||||||||||||||[/COLOR] [/CENTER]
[B]I well be updating this thread every hour or so![/B]
[CODE]Well Im finally moving on....From delta..........To Pali's Battlescape base i heard its very good So if u would like to be a part of this project just follow directions below :D[/CODE]
[CENTER]Name: Age: Email: Position: Experience: Why do you wish to join?: Can we trust you?: Will you stick with us?[/CENTER]
Legend [SIZE="3"][COLOR="Red"]INCOMPLETE [COLOR="Orange"]GETTING WORKED ON [COLOR="Lime"]COMEPLETE[/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[code][COLOR="Red"]508+ Game Frame[/COLOR] [COLOR="Lime"]474 game frame[/COLOR] [COLOR="Orange"]Customs Items only good ones not stupid shit![/COLOR] [COLOR="Red"][COLOR="Orange"]Swats new emote system converted[/COLOR][/COLOR] [COLOR="lime"]Swats new 474 animations loader[/COLOR] [COLOR="Red"]100% skill cape emotes done the real way![/COLOR] [COLOR="Orange"]Magic Interface[/COLOR] [COLOR="Lime"]100% Godsword stances,Run[/COLOR][/code]
[COLOR="Lime"]Duel arena Pest Control Warriors Guild [COLOR="red"]Bounty Hunter[/COLOR][/COLOR]
[B]COMBAT SYSTEM![/B]
[code][SIZE="3"]MINIGAMES!!![/SIZE] [LIST] [*]100% dueling [*]Staking works 100% and cannot be glitched. [*]No duping. [*]If you logout in a duel they win. [*]If it's a server glitch, you both keep items. [*]Disabling each type of combat works perfectly. [*]Disabling potions, food, and prayer all work perfectly. [*]Fun weapons works. [*]No special attacks works. [*]No forfeit works. [*]Obstacles works. [*]No movement works. [*]Handled. [/LIST] [/code]
[code][SIZE="3"] Combat System!!![/SIZE] [LIST] [*]Magic System [*]Every single spell works with projectiles and effects. [*]Teleother does not work, no point at this point. [*]Every spell that should freeze the other player, does. [*]Need to improve and work on some things such as maging after a melee/ranged attack. [*]Maging from a distance works, chasing if they run works. [*]Handled. [/LIST]
[LIST] [*]Ranged System [*]Ranging from a distance works 100%, chasing if they run works. [*]If you aren't within a certain distance you walk up until you are within a good distance to range. [*]Bows require arrows unless it's a crystal bow. [*]Each arrow has correct projectiles, distance is 100% accurate. [*]Arrows will follow the player if they are moving. [*]Hits only appear when arrow reaches player. [*]Handled. [/LIST] [LIST] [*]Melee System [*]Cannot move if frozen. Can't glitch or attack from that distance if frozen. [*]Good bonus/defence system implemented, will improve later. [*]Bonuses do affect your hits. [*]Special attack system implemented(my own system). [*]Draining/filling works. [*]Handled. [/LIST] [/code]
[code][SIZE="3"]PVP[/SIZE] [LIST] [*]PKing in the wild added. [*]Wilderness levels. [*]Items dropped upon death. [*]Four items kept, depending on value. [*]Skulled when you are the first attacker. [*]Timers work, skull disappears eventually. [*]You lose all items upon death unless you have protect items on. [/LIST]
[LIST] [*]Following when player runs. [*]You don't stop attacking if they run. [*]Multi areas added. [*]Multiple combat works 100%. [*]Multi-icon appears if in a multi area. [/LIST]
[LIST] [*]Eating/item clicking. [*]Timers work correctly. [*]Almost every food added for eating. [*]Bone burying. [*]Handled, of course. [/LIST][/code]
[code] Positions ~Owner~ ---- Zerked Up
~Server Programmer~ ---- [COLOR="Lime"]Trees[/COLOR] (OPEN)
~Graphic Artists~ ---- (OPEN) (OPEN)
~Forums/Website Designer~ (OPEN) (OPEN)[/code]
[B][COLOR="Blue"]PICS!![/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2rzfa68.png[/img][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2j27qls.png[/img][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rqlh7n.png[/img][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rft0eg.png[/img][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/a17ckk.png[/img][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ql92s2.png[/img]

item.title: \Project Snow/ The Blizzard Awakes
item.dc:creator: @x_Tonis121_x x_Tonis121_x
item.description:
@x_Tonis121_x wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:9, topic:341542”][quote author=x_Tonis121_x link=topic=437940.msg3222705#msg3222705 date=1275303830]
Name: Tonis(i swear thats my name)
Age: 16
Email: xtonis121x@live.com
Position: Website Manager
Experience: 8 Years of HTML & PHP coding.
Why do you wish to join?: I wish to join to build my skills as a web manager.
Can we trust you?: You can trust me.
Will you stick with us? I will stick with you.

Regards,
Tonis
[/quote]So you’ve been web developing since you was 11? basically you must be a guru?[/quote]

Technically yes.

But when i was 11, i was a newbie… so i guess you can call me a guru

Read full topic

[CENTER]PROGRESS

[/CENTER]

I well be updating this thread every hour or so!

Well Im finally moving on....From delta..........To Pali's Battlescape base i heard its very good So if u would like to be a part of this project just follow directions below :D

[CENTER]Name:
Age:
Email:
Position:
Experience:
Why do you wish to join?:
Can we trust you?:
Will you stick with us?[/CENTER]

Legend
[SIZE=“3”][COLOR=“Red”]INCOMPLETE
[COLOR=“Orange”]GETTING WORKED ON
[COLOR=“Lime”]COMEPLETE[/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]

[COLOR="Red"]508+ Game Frame[/COLOR] [COLOR="Lime"]474 game frame[/COLOR] [COLOR="Orange"]Customs Items only good ones not stupid shit![/COLOR] [COLOR="Red"][COLOR="Orange"]Swats new emote system converted[/COLOR][/COLOR] [COLOR="lime"]Swats new 474 animations loader[/COLOR] [COLOR="Red"]100% skill cape emotes done the real way![/COLOR] [COLOR="Orange"]Magic Interface[/COLOR] [COLOR="Lime"]100% Godsword stances,Run[/COLOR]

[COLOR=“Lime”]Duel arena
Pest Control
Warriors Guild
[COLOR=“red”]Bounty Hunter[/COLOR][/COLOR]

COMBAT SYSTEM!

[SIZE="3"]MINIGAMES!!![/SIZE] [LIST] [*]100% dueling [*]Staking works 100% and cannot be glitched. [*]No duping. [*]If you logout in a duel they win. [*]If it's a server glitch, you both keep items. [*]Disabling each type of combat works perfectly. [*]Disabling potions, food, and prayer all work perfectly. [*]Fun weapons works. [*]No special attacks works. [*]No forfeit works. [*]Obstacles works. [*]No movement works. [*]Handled. [/LIST]

[code][SIZE=“3”] Combat System!!![/SIZE]
[LIST]
[]Magic System
[]Every single spell works with projectiles and effects.
[]Teleother does not work, no point at this point.
[]Every spell that should freeze the other player, does.
[]Need to improve and work on some things such as maging after a melee/ranged attack.
[]Maging from a distance works, chasing if they run works.
[*]Handled.
[/LIST]

[LIST]
[]Ranged System
[]Ranging from a distance works 100%, chasing if they run works.
[]If you aren’t within a certain distance you walk up until you are within a good distance to range.
[]Bows require arrows unless it’s a crystal bow.
[]Each arrow has correct projectiles, distance is 100% accurate.
[]Arrows will follow the player if they are moving.
[]Hits only appear when arrow reaches player.
[]Handled.
[/LIST]
[LIST]
[]Melee System
[]Cannot move if frozen. Can’t glitch or attack from that distance if frozen.
[]Good bonus/defence system implemented, will improve later.
[]Bonuses do affect your hits.
[]Special attack system implemented(my own system).
[]Draining/filling works.
[*]Handled.
[/LIST]
[/code]

[code][SIZE=“3”]PVP[/SIZE]
[LIST]
[]PKing in the wild added.
[]Wilderness levels.
[]Items dropped upon death.
[]Four items kept, depending on value.
[]Skulled when you are the first attacker.
[]Timers work, skull disappears eventually.
[*]You lose all items upon death unless you have protect items on.
[/LIST]

[LIST]
[]Following when player runs.
[]You don’t stop attacking if they run.
[]Multi areas added.
[]Multiple combat works 100%.
[*]Multi-icon appears if in a multi area.
[/LIST]

[LIST]
[]Eating/item clicking.
[]Timers work correctly.
[]Almost every food added for eating.
[]Bone burying.
[*]Handled, of course.
[/LIST][/code]

[code]
Positions
~Owner~

Zerked Up

~Server Programmer~

(OPEN)

~Graphic Artists~

(OPEN)
(OPEN)

~Forums/Website Designer~
